EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q216.Reminder - Philly 5-12-16
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Philadelphia. We look forward to seeing you there!
Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow—Philadelphia, PA Friday, May 13, 2016 8:30am – 9:30am Registration & Breakfast 9:30am – 3:30pm Sessions
Roadshow Agenda https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/philadelphia
Location: The Hub Commerce Square <[[http://thehub.com/]]> (on Market Street between 20th and 21st Streets) 2001 Market Street, Two Commerce, Suite 210 Philadelphia, PA 19103 Room: Hadron
The Hub Commerce Square: Please enter through the main plaza (outside courtyard) Commerce Building #2, right side. Once you enter there will be a main Security desk and to the left of that, a smaller Hub entry greet desk. Please stop at that desk and mention either the Hub or Pivotal’s name. Our greeter will give you access through the turnstiles and direct you to the set of elevators which take you the 2nd floor. Once off the elevators, turn left, we are in Suite 210, you will see our Lobby desk to welcome you.
Parking information can be found here <[[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4P-2Z2JeoW7R3JDUkk0aDhiU0E/view?usp=sharing]]>.
Questions? Contact Peter Schmitt at pschmitt@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pschmitt@pivotal.io]]> or (707) 307-9590 <[[tel:1-707-307-9590]]>.
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow!
The Pivotal Team
